default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Hypatia Campbell, Fraser researcher. The purpose of my visit is to exchange disaster defense technologies and explore possibilities of coexistence... I hope our collaboration will be fruitful, Chief.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Unchecked power will only lead to destruction.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: If the decision's already made... then don't regret it, and don't look back.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Your support has been most valuable to me. Thank you.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Elaborate hairstyles can hinder movement, but... maintaining one's appearance is also a noble's obligation.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Keep a low profile, and don't drag your feet.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Everything shall be as you wish.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: If we try again, we can do better.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Roses bloom in sight.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I should have... stopped while I had the chance...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Using Mania to transmute metals, we can decompose, transfer, and rebuild matter until it's perfect. By mastering Ash Crystals, we will gain the power to resist disasters.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: The use of shackles, constraining Mania, and devouring Black Rings, all these technologies the Campbells seek but have never obtained somehow converged in a single person. What cruel past forged you into who you are today?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: There was a young girl from DisCity who insisted I bring you some things. A few letters, some mementos, and a stack of... IOUs with your name on them?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Every member of the Campbell family receives their own golden rose at their coming-of-age ceremony. It represents honor, but more importantly, obligation.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Turning stone into gold isn't difficult. It's the price that's typically more expensive than the result.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I hear the cries of those who've lost their homes and come seeking shelter, yet they're barred by gilded gates until the winds erase all their voices... Chief, tell me, is this truly the right path forward? I... I can't find the answer.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Greetings, Chief. Before we begin today's work, would you care for a cup of Campbell herbal tea?

default.title: Idle
default.text: Once the principles are understood, one can reverse-engineer a substance and reproduce it. But you're different. The mysteries around you are far too complex... Analysis might take time...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: DisCity's idea of hospitality leaves much to be desired.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Who will do the deed?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Hmm? Is this really all we need?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Sometimes, a gaze conveys more than words ever could. For instance... when you look at me, are you thinking of me?
